title: Ivern Q Projectile Speed
body:
Hello Everyone! 

Sorry to be posting this here, But I wasnt sure where I am supposed to ask something like this. I was just wondering what was ({{champion:427}} ) Iverns Q (Rootcaller) Projectile speed? Usually it seems slower that Morganas binding. Thanks in advance! :)

replies.body: Ivern's Q has a speed of 1300. Morg Q for comparison is 1200.
wait what? Iverns q feels like it moves so damn slow.
Keep in mind that Morgana's Q also has a hitbox the size of a fridge.
by 1300 is it like. 1300 units per second.? whatever unit the game grid is.

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zx7dWgen,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-10-08T21:10:34.226+0000)
>
> by 1300 is it like. 1300 units per second.? whatever unit the game grid is.

100 = the diameter of {{champion:17}} 's hit box. And it is per second if it is consistent with champion movement speed.
Yes. From one corner to another, the Summoner's Rift is 20 000, to give you an idea, which means Ivern's Q would take 15'34'' to cross the map, if he had the range.
Yea like if your playing golf in Tennessee and Morg hits Q in New York your going to have to put the game on hold for 3 seconds.
